ygData.subject: Re: Glowing Stein Revisited
ygData.msgSnippet: ... See Ziltus e-mail (16 Sep, 1709 hrs); it comfirms that there is no faction hit, if you are not invloved in the combat. However, he also states that if the
ygData.messageBody:
> From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>

> But they will still get the faction hits if they are group with u
> rite??

See Ziltus' e-mail (16 Sep, 1709 hrs); it comfirms that there is no
faction hit, if you are not invloved in the combat. However, he also
states that if the mob (fish, in this case) locks onto you initially,
even though you don't start the fight, and someone else pulls it
away, then you will still get faction hit.

So the best way prevent this from happening is to go far FAR away
before the fight starts, then sure cannot lock on to you... like
maybe run to Qeynos newbie area first...? *heh*


--


Love is in the air...
Get me a gas mask, quick!!!

Cya,
Praetor
